melting.configuration

Class RegisterMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • melting.configuration.RegisterMethods

  • public class RegisterMethods
extends java.lang.Object
    This class registers all the methods and models implemented by Melting.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RegisterMethods.MethodType
      Represents a particular type of method (e.g., approximative method, double dangling end method, Mg/Na mix correction method).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegisterMethods()
      creates a RegisterMethods object with the different initialised HasMaps.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ThermoResult computeOtherMeltingCorrections(Environment environment)
      corrects the melting temperature if other agents are present in the solution (formamide, DMSO, ...)
      CorrectionMethod getCorrectionMethod(java.lang.String optionName, java.lang.String methodName)
      This method is called to get the CorrectionMethod which represents the method 'methodName' entered with the option 'optionName'.
      CorrectionMethod getIonCorrectionMethod(Environment environment)
      This method is called to get the CorrectionMethod which represents the method or model used for the ion correction in the environment 'environment'.
      MeltingComputationMethod getMeltingComputationMethod(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> optionSet)
      This method is called to get the MeltingComputationMethod which represents the method or model for the enthalpy, entropy and melting temperature computation in the HashMap 'optionSet'.
      RegisterMethods.MethodType getMethodType()
      Gets an instance of the MethodType enum from the current instance of RegisterMethods.
      SodiumEquivalentMethod getNaEqMethod(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> optionSet)
      This method is called to get the SodiumEquivalentMethod which represents the method or model for the sodium equivalence in the HashMap 'optionSet'.
      PatternComputationMethod getPatternComputationMethod(java.lang.String optionName, java.lang.String methodName)
      This method is called to get the PatternComputationMethod which represents the method 'methodName' entered with the option 'optionName'.
      static RegisterMethods.MethodType makeMethodList()
      Creates an instance of the MethodType enum, initialized with all the (non-final) methods from the RegisterMethods class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegisterMethods

        public RegisterMethods()
        creates a RegisterMethods object with the different initialised HasMaps.

    • Method Detail

      • getPatternComputationMethod

        public PatternComputationMethod getPatternComputationMethod(java.lang.String optionName,
                                                   java.lang.String methodName)
        This method is called to get the PatternComputationMethod which represents the method 'methodName' entered with the option 'optionName'.
        Parameters:
        optionName - : option name
        methodName - : method or model name
        Returns:
        PatternComputationMethod object which represents the method 'methodName' entered with the option 'optionName'. If there is no PatternComputationMethod for the method 'methodName' entered with the option 'optionName', a NoExistingMethodException is thrown. If a InstantiationException or a IllegalAccessException is caught, a NoExistingMethodException is thrown.

      • getNaEqMethod

        public SodiumEquivalentMethod getNaEqMethod(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> optionSet)
        This method is called to get the SodiumEquivalentMethod which represents the method or model for the sodium equivalence in the HashMap 'optionSet'.
        Parameters:
        optionSet - : contains the options (default options and options entered by the user)
        Returns:
        SodiumEquivalentMethod object which represents the method or model for the sodium equivalence in the HashMap 'optionSet'. If there is no SodiumEquivalentMethod for the method 'methodName' entered with the option 'optionName', a NoExistingMethodException is thrown. If a InstantiationException or a IllegalAccessException is caught, a NoExistingMethodException is thrown. If the method is not applicable with the options present in 'optionSet', a MethodNotApplicableException

      • getIonCorrectionMethod

        public CorrectionMethod getIonCorrectionMethod(Environment environment)
        This method is called to get the CorrectionMethod which represents the method or model used for the ion correction in the environment 'environment'. If no ion correction method is specified by the user, the ion correction will be selected depending on the algorithm from Owczarzy et al. (2008)
        Parameters:
        environment -
        Returns:
        CorrectionMethod object which represents the method or model used for the ion correction in the environment 'environment'. If there is no SodiumEquivalentMethod for the method 'methodName' entered with the option 'optionName', a NoExistingMethodException is thrown. If a InstantiationException or a IllegalAccessException is caught, a NoExistingMethodException is thrown.

      • getMeltingComputationMethod

        public MeltingComputationMethod getMeltingComputationMethod(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> optionSet)
        This method is called to get the MeltingComputationMethod which represents the method or model for the enthalpy, entropy and melting temperature computation in the HashMap 'optionSet'.
        Parameters:
        optionSet - : contains the options (default options and options entered by the user)
        Returns:
        MeltingComputationMethod object which represents the method or model for the enthalpy, entropy and melting temperature computation in the HashMap 'optionSet'. If there is no SodiumEquivalentMethod for the method 'methodName' entered with the option 'optionName', a NoExistingMethodException is thrown. If a InstantiationException or a IllegalAccessException is caught, a NoExistingMethodException is thrown. If the method is not applicable with the options present in 'optionSet', a MethodNotApplicableException

      • getCorrectionMethod

        public CorrectionMethod getCorrectionMethod(java.lang.String optionName,
                                   java.lang.String methodName)
        This method is called to get the CorrectionMethod which represents the method 'methodName' entered with the option 'optionName'.
        Parameters:
        optionName - : option name
        methodName - : method or model name
        Returns:
        CorrectionMethod object which represents the method 'methodName' entered with the option 'optionName'. If there is no PatternComputationMethod for the method 'methodName' entered with the option 'optionName', a NoExistingMethodException is thrown. If a InstantiationException or a IllegalAccessException is caught, a NoExistingMethodException is thrown.

      • computeOtherMeltingCorrections

        public ThermoResult computeOtherMeltingCorrections(Environment environment)
        corrects the melting temperature if other agents are present in the solution (formamide, DMSO, ...)
        Parameters:
        environment -
        Returns:
        ThermoResult which contains the corrected melting temperature.

      • getMethodType

        public RegisterMethods.MethodType getMethodType()
        Gets an instance of the MethodType enum from the current instance of RegisterMethods.
        Returns:
        An instance of the MethodType enum, with non-final values filled in.

      • makeMethodList

        public static RegisterMethods.MethodType makeMethodList()
        Creates an instance of the MethodType enum, initialized with all the (non-final) methods from the RegisterMethods class.
        Returns:
        An instance of the MethodType enum, with non-final values filled in.
